title: Anonymous Whisper
content: I’ve always admired how confident you are, but I never had the courage to say it.

title: Someone Anonymous
content: What’s one decision you made that completely changed your life?

title: Hidden Thought
content: You inspire people more than you realize. Keep going.

title: Mystery Message
content: If you could restart one moment in your life, what would it be?

title: Unknown Sender
content: People feel safe opening up to you. That’s rare.

title: Anonymous Question
content: What’s something you wish people understood about you?
